channel.title: DC/RC showing Poss jump
channel.description:
#### What happened? I disconnected, reconnected and a dead slot had shown up as EK when original king hadn't died, effectively outing the Possessor
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Dead slot should have shown up as the Poss' chosen class (In this case, Possessor)
#### Steps to reproduce: Be in a Possessor game where Poss has jumped Disconnect, and reconnect
#### Comments: Mac User Picture shown here of what it looks like in-game ![07|690x380](upload://e0CD5TICgu0rhhXfgMyYcEHTAUD.png)

item.title: DC/RC showing Poss jump
item.dc:creator: BlueStorm
item.description:
What happened?

I disconnected, reconnected and a dead slot had shown up as EK when original king hadn’t died, effectively outing the Possessor

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

Dead slot should have shown up as the Poss’ chosen class (In this case, Possessor)

Steps to reproduce:

Be in a Possessor game where Poss has jumped
Disconnect, and reconnect

Comments:

Mac User
Picture shown here of what it looks like in-game

Read full topic
